resources.string: The Winnipeg App is an app designed to consolidate most of the city of Winnipeg services into one app such as waste and snow removal, utility readings, and weather warnings. As well, general inquiries for city services such as potholes, fallen trees, and graffiti removal can be made.
Concept by: Sergii Us and Consultica
Developed by: Amari Len, Christian Isip, Mauricio Fagundes, and Brett Cann
